original: Host the Game so others can join\nYou will not be able to change the starting date or savegame after you have hosted
translation: 创建一个游戏以便让其他人能够加入该游戏\n在游戏创建以后，你将不能改变开局时间或者读取其他存档

original: See the [This.GetFullName] granted to a new ruler
translation: 希望看到[This.GetFullName]被授予给一位新的统治者

original: Weaken the power base of [This.Holder.GetTitledName] by dividing [This.Holder.GetHerHis] holdings and granting the [This.GetFullName] to one of [This.Holder.GetHerHis] vassals.
translation: 削弱 [This.Holder.GetTitledName]的力量基础，通过分割[This.Holder.GetHerHis]产业并授予[This.GetFullName]给[This.Holder.GetHerHis]其中一个封臣。

original: Put the plot into motion by sending an ultimatum to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
translation: 通过向 [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]下达最后通牒，把密谋付诸行动。

original: Seek the backing of [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] in dividing the holdings of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] by sending [Root.TopLiege.GetHerHim] a letter. If the [Root.TopLiege.GetTitle] does not support the plot, it will likely be leaked at court...
translation: 向 [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]写一封信，寻求[Root.TopLiege.GetHerHim]的支持以分割 [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的领土。如果[Root.TopLiege.GetTitle]不支持这项密谋，它就很可能被泄露到宫廷内……

original:
My [Root.GetTitle], many of your faithful subjects, myself included, feel that [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has amassed more power and titles than is warranted by [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] station. If you were to kindly advise [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] to abdicate the [From.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName] to a vassal, know that this decision would enjoy our wholehearted support.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的[Root.GetTitle]，包括我在内的许多忠实的封臣都认为 [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]攫取了远远超过[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]地位的权力和领地。如果您能友好地建议[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]把[From.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName]的头衔转让给他的封臣、那就再好不过了，我们将全心全意的支持你。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I will have no part in this scheme.
translation: 我将不会参与这场密谋。

original:
We must confess to sharing in your concerns regarding the rising affluence of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. For the good of the realm, we shall contact [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] forthwith and seek the compromise you suggested.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我们都对 [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的膨胀中的实力感到担忧。为了国家的安宁，我们应该立刻联系[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]，以实现你的计划。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Don't be a fool, [Root.GetFirstName]! I will not see this realm torn asunder by intrigue and connivery. Abandon this scheme now, or on my oath you'll come to regret it!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
别做个傻子，[Root.GetFirstName]！我不希望看到国家由于密谋诡计而支离破碎。现在给我停止这场阴谋，否则我发誓你将会为此后悔！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
My dear [Root.GetTitle], we hope this letter finds you in good health. We have been urged by certain concerned parties to take steps in restoring the precarious balance of power in the realm, and we think it best if you voluntarily abdicate the [From.PlotTargetTitle] to one of your vassals. We are certain you will agree.

Signed,
[From.Liege.GetTitledName]
translation:
我亲爱的[Root.GetTitle]，希望你身体健康。某个派系正在催促我采取行动恢复国内领主的实力均衡，我们认为你最好能自愿将[From.PlotTargetTitle]转让给你的一个封臣.我们确信你会赞同这个意见.

此致，
[From.Liege.GetTitledName]

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] receives a thinly veiled ultimatum from the [Root.Liege.GetTitle].
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]从[Root.Liege.GetTitle]那里收到一份露骨的最后通牒。

original:
You have upset the delicate balance of power in the realm, [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Relinquish control of the [From.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName] to one of your vassals for the good of all, lest my confederates and I accomplish the same through force of arms.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]，你已经危及了我国微妙的力量平衡。为了所有人的利益，请放弃对[From.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName]的控制，把它交给你的一个封臣，否则我和我的同僚将以武力达成同样的效果。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: There are no eligible vassals, so you will have to take it yourself.
translation: 由于没有合适的封臣，你自己将得到这个头衔。

original:
Though I am sure I shall curse your name until the end of times, I will agree to your demand in the interest of peace.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
即便我敢肯定我将一直咒骂汝名，至死方休，可为了和平，我还是不得不接受你的要求。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
I would no sooner surrender the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName] than I would my right arm. If you and your little friends can muster the courage to face me, I shall gladly see you cut down to the last man. Come then!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
比起向[Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName]投降，我更愿意拿起武器。如果你和你的小伙伴们能鼓起勇气来面对我，我会很乐意把你们杀到一个都不剩！放马过来吧！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You will choke on those words, my dear [From.GetTitle].
translation: 你会为你这番话后悔的，我亲爱的[From.GetTitle]。

original: Perhaps I should not risk war...
translation: 也许我不应该冒险一战……

original:
You put me in a difficult position, my liege, but if you feel this is the best course of action, then so be it. I shall surrender the title.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，你把我推向一个困难的境地，但如果你感觉到这是最佳的行动方案，那么就如你所愿吧。我将交出这个头衔。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: The [Root.Liege.GetTitle] has managed to arrange the abdication. [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] now rules the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName].
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitle]成功让原来的领主让位。现在，由[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]统治[Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName]。

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] has refused the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]'s reasonable request to abdicate the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName], but at least this has given your liege the impetus to potentially revoke it in the future. It appears you will have to settle on this arrangement for now.
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了[Root.Liege.GetTitle]让出[Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName]头衔的合理要求，但这至少让你的领主有了在未来剥夺这个头衔的动机。显然，现在你将只能接受这个安排。

original: Through the machinations of a secret conspiracy of noblemen, [From.GetTitledName] has been forced to abdicate one of [From.GetHerHis] duchies. After much deliberation, the lords of the realm have finally managed to agree on you as the least offensive candidate for the title. Congratulations, [From.GetTitle].
translation: 通过贵族们秘密的阴谋，[From.GetTitledName]被迫出让[From.GetHerHis]其中一个公国。经过认真考虑，国内的领主们最终设法达成一致，认为你是这个头衔最无侵略性的候选人。恭喜你，[From.GetTitle]。

original: Good things come to those who wait.
translation: 好事情总是发生在愿意等待的人身上。

original: [From.GetTitledName] had no eligible vassals to receive the title, so it has been granted to you instead to do with as you see fit.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]没有合适的封臣能接受这个头衔，所以它将被授予给你，由你决定如何处置。

original: [This.Holder.GetTitledName] is no longer the ruler of the [This.GetFullName].
$OLD_LIEGE$ has transferred the vassalage of $VASSAL$ to $NEW_LIEGE$
War for a New Ruler of $OTHER_TITLE$.
cannot be allowed to continue like this! I must tell [This.GetTitledFirstName] how irresponsible [This.GetHerHis] behavior is!
translation: 不能允许这样继续下去了！我必须告诉[This.GetTitledFirstName][This.GetHerHis]行为有多不负责任！
